review: It worked for a few months, at first I had problems making the Ipad detect it, now the TV doesn't even detect it... the network doest detect it, and I literally put the WIFI Repeater 4 centimeters from the device behind the TV...It's a great idea, but troubleshooting this thing, when they say basically, "do this"and you "did this"you know you "did this"and there's nothing else you "can do"And I know it's not the repeater, or the wifi, or anything that Google blames for it not working besides themselves, because it worked for a few months there... now it's just dead in the water... not even being picked up by the repeater... it's just, kaput.

review: If you're thinking you'll save money to buy the Chromecast instead of the more expensive options like Roku, believe me, it's not worth it. Sometimes my chrome cast works... usually I spend so much time trying to cast a video that it exceeds the amount of time I would have spent watching a television show, and I give up. I really just don't get it. It will work fine then not at all for days, and the chrome cast help suggestions are just a slap in the face implying that the issue is anything but the s***ty device itself.
